Package me.julb.library.utility.exceptions

Class AbstractRemoteSystemException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • me.julb.library.utility.exceptions.BaseException
            • me.julb.library.utility.exceptions.AbstractRemoteSystemException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RemoteSystemClientErrorException, RemoteSystemServerErrorException, UnableToReachRemoteSystemException
    public abstract class AbstractRemoteSystemException
extends BaseException
    This exception is thrown in case a request to a remote system fails.

    See Also:
